mdRecord.dcterms:title: Confederate Monument, detail view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Buberl, Caspar (American sculptor, 1834-1899) [sculptor, figure]
Henry-Bonnard Bronze Company (American foundry, 1884 CE-) [foundry]
Zolnay, George Julian (Romanian, Hungarian, and American sculptor, 1863-1949) [designer, base tablets]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Commissioned by the Ladies Confederate Memorial Association. Funded by the Ladies Confederate Memorial Association and private contributions. Cost: $4,000. A competition was held and Caspar Buberl was chosen as the sculptor. George Julian Zolnay designed the four tablets for the base, listing names of soldiers buried in the University of Virginia Cemetery. -- Art Inventories Catalog, SIRIS [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: James Murray Howard University of Virginia Historic Buildings and Grounds Collection
